channel.title: SAIC on Feasible Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in SAIC on Feasible Analytics

item.title: NASA: Probabilistic Campaign Manifest Analysis Tool
item.description: Probabilistic Campaign Manifest Analysis Tool (PCMAT) was an excel based tool that would take in a manifest for a lunar campaign and run a simulation to evaluate various metrics about the campaign. I updated and expanded the capabilities of the this tool to track new metrics and increase the number of Bernoulli trials run within the course of a campaign. In addition, I improved the efficiency of the model through VBA and advanced EXCEL worksheet formulas.
